title: Chillar Party
writer: Vikas Bahl, Rajesh Bajaj, Vijay Maurya
short_cast: Irfan Khan, Raju, Sanath Menon, Rohan Grover, Naman Jain, Aarav Khanna, Vishesh Tiwari, Chinmay Chandraunshuh, Vedant Desai, Shriya Sharma, Divji Handa

desc: Eight feisty boys befriend young drifter Fatka. When a mean politician threatens Fatka's way of life, the boys band together in honor of their pal.
